column4: I want to migrate from 9.04 to 10.4, how can I transfer programs, configuration and data between them?
you can do a upgrade from 9.04 to 9.10 then 10.04, but it's likely to break your system.
so the only option is to backup /home and /etc and manually transfer the stuff I need to a clean install?
well, backuping /home and keeping track of your programs should be enough. Transfering /etc from one version to another is insane.
